trans-unit.source: The file "%s" doesn't exist on your server!
trans-unit.target: Il file "%s" non è presente nel tuo server!

trans-unit.source:
The db-entry with ID %s in "tl_gallery_pictures" links to a not existing file.
Please clean up the database or check the existence of %s in the album with alias: %s!
The file "%s" could not been uploaded!
trans-unit.target: Il file "%s" non può essere caricato!

trans-unit.source: The file "%s" ist not readable! Check access rights.
trans-unit.target: Il file "%s" non può essere letto! Controllare i permessi.

trans-unit.source: The directory "%s" is not writeable! Check chmod settings!
trans-unit.target: La directory "%s" non ha i permessi di scritura! Controllare i settaggi chmod!

trans-unit.source: Gallery Creator only supports jpeg/jpg files.
File successfully uploaded to the server.

trans-unit.target: torna alla back to general view

trans-unit.source: You tried to enter a protected album. Please log in as a frontend user or check your member-rights.
trans-unit.target: Hai cercato di accedere a un album protetto. Prego effettua il login come utente frontend o controlla i tuoi permessi.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete album with ID %s? \r\nAttention! \nAll image-files in the assigned directory will be deleted too!!!
Do you really want to delete picture with ID %s? \r\nAttention! \nThe image-file will be deleted too!!!
